text:
A habitual offender was detained under the Goondas Act as per recommendations of Superintendent of Police A. Saravanan here on Monday. Collector T.N. Hariharan issued the order.

R. Vinodh (29) of MGR Nagar at Munjikkal in Kodaikanal town was doing criminal activities that were causing inconvenience to the public and deteriorating the law and order situation in the town.
title: One detained under Goondas Act
